TopicTitle: Shortcuts for every Space Center Building in Nav mode

Articles.Content:
Hi, when pressing Escape Key during navigation, i think a shortcut for every space center's building (well, maybe not for admin and astronaut complex) would be really TIME SAVING.

For Instance, when finishing a contract and want to get some new, always have to go to Space Center First, losing those good 7-8 seconds (aprox) during Space Center's charge, and another good 4(?) for entering Mission Control. 

Taking into account that we need to do these kind of translations very often, there is much time to be saved with the addition of the suggested shortcuts.

Please notify me if there is any mod that can shorten the translations in any way or adds the shortcuts mentioned,

Thanks!
